channel.title: Webclient Assistance Request [Bluur,Delta]
channel.description:
Good old PkPlanet source.
I followed several "tutorials" on how to make a webclient (Ric's and others), and followed through paying attention etc. I managed to get my client running, download the cache, but after unpacking... Ugh. [img]http://gyazo.com/ef7c2142a8be6b856a188426500a1861.png?1360867046[/img]
In response: I did everything over and compared tutorials and all that jazz many, many times. Which included redoing my cache, moving things around, playing with the Jarmaker/Signer, until it occurred to me I had been at this for five hours, was exhausted, and that something outside of my jarring and cache was wrong.
Today, I made several attempts and got the same results. I tested the client on another computer as well, with the same outcome (kill me).
What I would conclude is that obviously there is more to doing this, but I have not the slightest idea what. I've seen a lot of sources in the download section carrying slogans such as "webclient ready", that make it seem just as likely.
I've been trying to ditch the dreadful PkPlanet client, but it would not allow me to connect with anything but it's own client. However, after reading the dozens of complaints on the thread for the source, the creator claimed that he had a webclient working for it. I have not seen any stories of success, and did not catch any good advice on that thread.
A bit long winded but I don't feel like replying for details. Could anyone give me some hints here? All help is appreciated, thanks.

item.title: Webclient Assistance Request [Bluur,Delta]
item.dc:creator: @darthbonsly darthbonsly
item.description:
@darthbonsly wrote:

A web browser.

[code] Saga Webclient






[/code]

Read full topic

@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

Are you trying this on a web browser or a jarred client?

item.title: Webclient Assistance Request [Bluur,Delta]
item.dc:creator: @darthbonsly darthbonsly
item.description:
@darthbonsly wrote:

e18af7c90cb747ff7228c95431b7ac8a.png?1360868913738×480

Quite the needle in a haystack operation…

I deleted the downloaded cache and reloaded the client a few times again, not to any success.

Any suggestions?

Read full topic

item.title: Webclient Assistance Request [Bluur,Delta]
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

I’m assuming the cache didn’t unpack correctly.

Read full topic
